parts.text: {"word":"generalizability","priority":"★★☆","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"noun","definition":"一般化可能性、汎用性：ある研究結果や理論が、他の状況、集団、時間、場所などにも適用できる程度。","english_definition":"The extent to which
